documents.title: Pride and Prejudice
documents.author: Jane Austen
documents.summary: The novel follows the story of Elizabeth Bennet, a spirited young woman navigating love, societal expectations, and family drama in 19th-century England.

documents.title: Moby Dick
documents.author: Herman Melville
documents.summary: The narrative follows Ishmael and his voyage aboard the whaling ship Pequod, commanded by Captain Ahab, who is obsessed with hunting the elusive white whale, Moby Dick.

documents.title: Frankenstein
documents.author: Mary Shelley
documents.summary: Victor Frankenstein, driven by an unquenchable thirst for knowledge, creates a living being, only to face tragic consequences as his creation turns monstrous.
